details: Create a `STANDARDS.md` file in the root. Define the Golden Stack: Django 5.x, Tailwind CSS (via Vite), HTMX. Define Design Tokens: Color palette (Primary, Secondary, Accent), Typography (Sans/Serif), and Spacing. Document the decision to deprecate Bootstrap.

Create `tests/test_ui_standardization.py`. It should have tests that visit the homepages of Hub, KrisPC, Plexus, and Pdf2Cal (using Django Client). The tests must assert 1) The presence of the standard Vite/Tailwind script tags, 2) The ABSENCE of Bootstrap CDN links or legacy CSS files, 3) The presence of a common 'data-theme-version' attribute on the <body> tag.

Create `templates/layouts/golden_base.html`. This template must implement the stack defined in Task 1. It should include the Vite assets, HTMX script, and the defined design tokens (as CSS variables). It should feature a standardized Header and Footer structure.

feature: Migrate KrisPC Hub to Golden Standard
details: Refactor `hub/templates/hub/base.html` (or delete it) and make Hub views extend `layouts/golden_base.html`. Update Hub's UI components to use Tailwind classes instead of Bootstrap. Verify `test_ui_standardization.py` passes for Hub.
Refactor `krispc/templates/the_base.html` to extend `layouts/golden_base.html`. Convert Bootstrap classes to Tailwind. Verify `test_ui_standardization.py` passes for KrisPC.
Refactor `plexus/templates/plexus/plexus_base.html` to extend `layouts/golden_base.html`. Convert Plexus-specific UI (Kanban, etc.) to Tailwind. Verify `test_ui_standardization.py` passes for Plexus.
Refactor `p2c/templates/p2c_base.html` to extend `layouts/golden_base.html`. Convert P2C UI components to Tailwind. Verify `test_ui_standardization.py` passes for Pdf2Cal.
Remove `django-crispy-forms` and `crispy-bootstrap5` from `Pipfile` if no longer used. Remove legacy CSS files. Ensure `pipenv install` cleans up dependencies. Run the full test suite.
